channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- DistFork Jenkins plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- DistFork Jenkins plugin

item.title: CVE-2017-2652|2024-08-05T14:02:07.258Z -- jenkins%20project -- distfork%20jenkins%20plugin
item.description: It was found that there were no permission checks performed in the Distributed Fork plugin before and including 1.5.0 for Jenkins that provides the dist-fork CLI command beyond the basic check for Overall/Read permission, allowing anyone with that permission to run arbitrary shell commands on all connected nodes.
